sentences.sContent: The battle began at 5.30 a.m., when shots were exchanged over Marsh Creek. In the face of Buford's resistance, Heth pushed on cautiously until he reached a point about two miles west of Gettysburg.
sentences.sCn: 上午5点30分，双方在沼泽溪一带交火，面对巴福德的顽强抵御，海斯步步为营，谨慎前进，一直推进到葛底士堡大约2英里之处，随后他以两个旅的兵力列队进攻。
